summary: This document is an email chain from August 11, 2019, containing internal communications about inmate Jeffrey Epstein's records in the Special Housing Unit (SHU). It includes attached files with shift records and comments, and notes that Epstein received meals and that an Officer in Charge signed off on his forms.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the email correspondence; records indicate he was in the Special Housing Unit (SHU), received meals, and had his forms signed off by an Officer in Charge.

events.title: Epstein's SHU Shift Record
events.description: A shift record for inmate Jeffrey Epstein in the Special Housing Unit is referenced, indicating he took breakfast, lunch, and dinner.

keyFacts: The email is dated August 11, 2019, and discusses records for inmate Jeffrey Epstein.
Attached files include SHU comments and a shift record from August 9, 2019 (Friday).
The records indicate Epstein was in the Special Housing Unit (SHU) and received all three meals on that date.
An Officer in Charge (OIC) signed off on Form 292 for each shift (morning, day, evening).
The correspondence appears to be an internal update or response to a request for inmate records.
